title: I need help
body: When I play LoL, and want to buy items.I can't buy, the tab stays there for many minutes.I keep clicking and press X to close tab.And, the tab when close down till 30 minutes or more.How can this be fixed? does LoL have customer support to fix this problem? I need LoL to help me without difficulties.

replies.body: I'm not sure what you mean by "tab". I'm *pretty sure* you mean the shop window, but I'll need more info. Perhaps you could grab a screenshot with **F12** and upload the screenshot from its location (C:\Riot Games\League of Legends\Screenshots) to a place like [**Imgur**](https://imgur.com/) and link me?
